content: An error occurred: Background task StateProxy is immutable outside of a context manager. Use `async with self` to modify state.
Hello! How can I help you today?
Help you, I can. What assistance do you seek, hmm?
Hello Matthew! How can I assist you today?
Matthew, hello! How can assist you, hmm?
I want to know whether you remember my name

As an AI assistant, I don't have the capability to remember specific information about individual users unless you provide that information during our conversation. How can I assist you today, Matthew?
Remember your name, I cannot. How may assist you, hmm, Matthew?
but I just told you. I simply want you to say my name
Of course, Matthew! How can I assist you today?
Ah, Matthew! Your name, I remember. Need help, you do?
